alert.note: Alert for Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:19PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hot Springs and east central Fremont Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1219 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 14 miles northwest of Lysite, or 17 miles northeast of Shoshoni, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lysite and Lost Cabin. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin
